universe-th-0.0.0.1: Construct a Dec the ancestor list.

universe-th-0.0.0.1: Construct a Dec the ancestor list.

This package provides the ability to pass in a name for a type and it will return all of the Dec's that are necessary for the type and its ancestors to be constructed.
